issue.title: [Ruby] Error building red-arrow on msys2

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4021?focusedCommentId=16720797) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
It seems that some some head characters aren't included in the log.
Can you attach `E:/rubies/rubyinstaller-2.5.3-1-x64/lib/ruby/gems/2.5.0/extensions/x64-mingw32/2.5.0/glib2-3.3.0/gem_make.out` and `E:/rubies/rubyinstaller-2.5.3-1-x64/lib/ruby/gems/2.5.0/extensions/x64-mingw32/2.5.0/glib2-3.3.0/mkmf.log`?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4021?focusedCommentId=16853422) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
I think that this is pkg-config gem issue. And it has been fixed.
